languages.text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary
When the wearer scores the first successful {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} on their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target will suffer from {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}. The wearer does not suffer this effect themselves.
languages.original_text:
Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Еретик{/g} — поборник
Когда персонаж наносит первое {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g} за свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угрозы варпа{/g}. При этом на самого персонажа они не действуют.

traits.locale_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary
When the wearer scores the first successful {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} on their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target will suffer from {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}. The wearer does not suffer this effect themselves.

Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary
When the wearer scores the first successful {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} on their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target will suffer from {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}. The wearer does not suffer this effect themselves.

Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent
When the wearer scores the first successful {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} on their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target will suffer from {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}. The wearer does not suffer this effect themselves.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}異端{/g}―信奉者が必要
使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で最初の{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}を与えたとき、ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な<歪み>{/g}にさらされる。使用者自身がこの効果を受けることはない。
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary
When the wearer scores the first successful {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} on their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target will suffer from {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}. The wearer does not suffer this effect themselves.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}異端{/g}―信奉者が必要
使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で最初の{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}を与えたとき、ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な<歪み>{/g}にさらされる。使用者自身がこの効果を受けることはない。

languages.text:
需要信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}异端主义{/g}——信奉者
当装备者在{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中首次造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}时，会对目标施加{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}。装备者本身不会受到此效果影响。
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary

traits.locale_text:
需要信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}异端主义{/g}——信奉者

languages.text:
Requiere {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hereje{/g}: Devoto
Cuando el portador asesta el primer {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g} de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el objetivo sufre {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g}. El portador no sufre este efecto.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary

traits.locale_text:

languages.text:
Erfordert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Ketzer{/g} — Geweihter
Erzielt der Träger den ersten {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} in seinem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}, wird das Ziel mit{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g} belegt. Der Träger selbst wird nicht mit diesem Effekt belegt.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary
When the wearer scores the first successful {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} on their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target will suffer from {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}. The wearer does not suffer this effect themselves.

traits.locale_text:
Erfordert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Ketzer{/g} – Geweihter
Erzielt der Träger den ersten {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} in seinem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}, wird das Ziel mit{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g} belegt. Der Träger selbst wird nicht mit diesem Effekt belegt.

languages.text:
Requiert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hérétique{/g} — Disciple
Lorsque l'utilisateur porte un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g} pour la première fois au cours de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, sa cible subit des {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g}. L'utilisateur est lui-même invulnérable à cet effet.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Kâfirce{/g} — Coşkulu kanaati gerektirir
Takan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} esnasında ilk başarılı {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruşunu{/g} gerçekleştiğinde hedef, {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}öteboyut tehlikelerine{/g} maruz kalır. Takan kişinin kendisi ise bu etkiden muaf olur.
